original_text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes, Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple, and ye laid no hold on me.
korean_text: 그 때에 예수께서 무리에게 말씀하시되 너희가 강도를 잡는 것 같이 칼과 몽치를 가지고 나를 잡으러 나왔느냐 내가 날마다 성전에 앉아 가르쳤으되 너희가 나를 잡지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes
Are ye come out as against a thief
with swords and staves for to take me?
sentences.korean_translation: 칼과 몽둥이를 들고 나를 잡으러 왔느냐?

sentences.original_text: I sat daily with you teaching in the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 날마다 성전에서 너희와 함께 앉아 가르쳤는데

sentences.original_text: and ye laid no hold on me.
